name: VideoHive Downloader
description:
VideoHive Downloader gives creators and teams a dependable way to save VideoHive stock assets for offline access. Instead of juggling manual captures or risky browser extensions, it pulls publicly accessible files directly from VideoHive with consistent quality.

Use it to archive research material, prep client deliverables, or keep your personal library available when you're traveling or working with limited connectivity.
seo_description: Download VideoHive stock assets for offline use. Fast, private VideoHive downloader.
features: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Contact us for current licensing options.

faqs.question: How do I use VideoHive Downloader?
faqs.answer: Open VideoHive, choose the stock assets you need, and start the download directly from the app. Files save to your designated folder immediately.

faqs.question: What quality options are available?
faqs.answer: VideoHive Downloader keeps the highest quality available from VideoHive, preserving resolution, bitrate, and metadata whenever possible.

faqs.question: Does this work with private or DRM content?
faqs.answer: It's designed for publicly accessible material that you have rights to download. It doesn't bypass DRM, logins, or paywalls.

faqs.question: Can I run bulk downloads?
faqs.answer: Yes. Queue multiple links and the downloader processes them sequentially with automatic retries if the connection drops.

faqs.question: Is my data tracked?
faqs.answer: No. Downloads stay on your device and we don't capture usage analytics or content copies.

reviews.name: Jonas Vega
reviews.review: I download VideoHive stock assets for my projects and VideoHive Downloader keeps everything organized without hiccups.
reviews.title: Keeps VideoHive projects moving

reviews.name: Luca Whitaker
reviews.review: The quality from VideoHive stays perfect, and batch downloads mean I can collect hours of material in minutes.
reviews.title: Ideal for building VideoHive archives

reviews.name: Camila Tanaka
reviews.review: Privacy-friendly workflows were the missing piece for us-VideoHive Downloader never sends VideoHive data anywhere else.
reviews.title: Smooth VideoHive capture every time
